Class Simulation

java.lang.Object
org.im4r0ve.Simulation
public class Simulation
extends java.lang.Object
Responsible for maintaining the map and anthills in it.

  • Method Details

    • step

      public Result step()
      Spawns food and calls step on all anthills on the map.
      Returns:
      returns Map, so Application can draw it.

    • spawnFood

      private void spawnFood()
      Spawns randomly food every step of the simulation. Spawns it only on GRASS and based on foodSpawnAmount and maxFoodPerTile creates a circle of food on the map.

    • getTile

      public Tile getTile​(int x, int y)
      Gets Tile at coordinates x,y from the map. You can use indexes from -width to infinity and it returns x and y from within the bounds of the map.

    • getHeight

      public int getHeight()
      Gets height of the map

    • getWidth

      public int getWidth()
      Gets width of the map

    • getFoodPerTile

      public int getFoodPerTile()
      Returns:
      Maximum amount of food on
